pullRequest.title: Fix remote oath for remote connections
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes

Remote connection details

Complete refactor using Ant Design within the Admin Panel
Updated to use the new Oauth through a seperate window


Create Remote Project

Complete refactor using Ant Design
Updated to use new Oauth through seperate window


Remote Project Settings

Complete refactor using Ant Design
Updated to use new Oauth through seperate window



Related issue
Fixes #792
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:

 CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.
 Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
 User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

commit.message: Merge branch 'FIX-remote-oath' of github.com:phac-nml/irida into FIX-remote-oath
🚧 Looked down ajax paths only for admins
🚧 Fixed path after creating a new remote connection
♻️ Cleaned up unused files and webpack entry
🚧 Ignore these tests, implement again on next branch
:construction: Working fetch projects when switching apis

:construction: Working create remote.:construction:

Still needs to have redirect and errors set up.
:recycle: Cleaning up old code and updating i18n
:construction: Add check to see if the token is expired.
:construction: Updated request to create remote project with better enum support
:construction: removed old angular reference and page variables
:construction: This was added to the wrong page

Merge branch 'FIX-remote-oauth-CLIENT_DETAILS' into FIX-remoate-oath-CREATE_REMOTE_PROJECT

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGELOG.md
:construction: Fixed issue with center popup window on screen
Updated remote project sync settings page to use ant design and react. Updated CHANGELOG

Merge pull request #797 from phac-nml/FIX-remote-oauth-CLIENT_DETAILS

Fix remote oauth remote connection details
Merged in create remote project branch
:fire: This class was not used anymore
:recycle: Made the sync frequency into its own component
Removed translations not needed and removed page variables for these translations. Updated ProjectSynchronizationSettings component to use SyncFrequencySelect component for selecting sync frequency
:white_check_mark: Fixed broken remote sync page tests
Renamed RemoteProjectInfo to RemoteProjectSettings. Added labelRequired to SyncFrequency which accepts true or false and will only display the label if it is set to true(default).

Merge branch 'development' into FIX-remote-oath

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGELOG.md

Merge branch 'FIX-remote-oath' into FIX-remoate-oath-CREATE_REMOTE_PROJECT

# Conflicts:
#	CHANGELOG.md

Merge pull request #801 from phac-nml/FIX-remoate-oath-CREATE_REMOTE_PROJECT

Fix remoate oath create remote project
Added test for remote project synchronization settings page
Moved ajax methods to new controller. Updated sync mapping method to accept a RemoteProjectSettingsUpdateRequest dto instead of individual params.
Removed redundant setting of base url
Removed br tags, updated to use ant design title, removed redudnant === true when checking if forceSync is set

Created new UIRemoteProjectService and refactored code from ProjectSettingsRemoteAjaxController into this service to clean up controller. Updated translation keys to preface with server.ProjectRemote which are returned for that component. Updated controller methods to return ResponseEntity<DTOTYYPE> and uiremoteprojectservice to return objects rather than a map
Updated to catch an exception and return bad request http status

Added tests for uiremoteprojectservice. Updated getProjectRemoteSettings method to catch an error. Updated remote-projects.js api calls to catch and throw errors that the component can catch and display

Merge pull request #803 from deepsidhu85/FIX-remote-oauth-PROJECT_SYNC_SETTINGS

Fix remote oauth project sync settings

nodes.bodyText: Remove commented out code or re-enable if needed please.

Issue with this new expiration message.  It doesn't actually check if the connection is valid before displaying this message.  There could be a case where the token is revoked but it just displays the expires message instead of validating the token.
Steps to reproduce:

Create client, remote api, and connect
Go to clients and revoke the token
Look at remote api pages and it just says "expires whenever" and doesn't actually check if its valid

In this case it should display the "connect" button again so users can get their new token.
Should this go into the dto path instead of just in the base ajax one?
This should not need a @RestController mapping.  Just @Controller right?
There's enough of these dto classes to make a sub package for the Remote API stuff.  That package is getting messy.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.ajax.dto;
+
+import ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.model.project.ProjectSyncFrequency;
+
+/**
+ * Used to handle requests from the UI to update settings for a remote sync'd project.
+ * The field is the attribute to be update, and the value is the value to set to that field.
+ */
+
+public class RemoteProjectSettingsUpdateRequest {

nodes.bodyText: Again, this should likely be a @Controller
Do we need 2 separate classes for this?  It's a combined 3 methods between this class and the Ajax controller.
What's the point of this class?  It's just re-wrapping other service methods.  Every method is only called from one place.  Why not just have the functionality in those places?
Same deal with this class.  These 2 methods are only used in one place.  Why add an extra class?
Remove commented code if its not needed, or redo method if it is needed
Is this test re-written somewhere else?

commit.message: :recycle: Add better directory structure for remote dtos
Updated checkApiStatus to check if  api service status returns a 200 http status code otherwise an exception is thrown and the connect button is displayed for the api
